Place: VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering & Technology, Whisper Valley, Hyderabad, Telangana, India
history: VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering & Technology was established in the year 1995. It is affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad. The institute is known for its academic excellence and industry collaborations. It offers a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs in engineering and technology. The campus is equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to provide a conducive learning environment for students. The institute has a strong focus on research and innovation.
Ecological Relevance: The institute is located in Whisper Valley, Hyderabad, which is known for its lush green surroundings and biodiversity. It provides a serene and eco-friendly campus for students to study and engage in research activities.

timeline.Details: VNR Vignana Jyothi Institute of Engineering & Technology was established.
The institute affiliated with Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Hyderabad.
Introduction of undergraduate programs in engineering.
Commencement of postgraduate programs in various disciplines.
Expansion of campus infrastructure and facilities.
Celebration of 20 years of academic excellence.
Establishment of research centers to promote innovation.
Introduction of industry collaborations for practical exposure.
Recognition for contributing to technical education and research.
Adoption of online learning platforms in response to the pandemic.
